title: Udemy - Essential Business Formulas and Ratios for Managers
description:
Udemy - Essential Business Formulas and Ratios for Managers

English | 2015 | .MP4 | h264, yuv420p, 1280x720, 15&30fps | aac, 44100 Hz, stereo | 495 MB
Genre: E-learning

Learn how to develop a range of business formulas, how to apply them, and effectively use financial data in your reports

What am I going to get from this course?

Over 60 lectures and 3.5 hours of content!
You will have the ability to more confidently and effectively include financial data in your reports and presentations.
You will master your numerical skills, learn how to make the complex financial formulas simple, and how to create powerful communication tools by improving their explanations.
You will be able to develop a range of financial formulas and apply them to typical situations.
You will have gained the skills needed to understand and explain financial reports.
You will understand how to perform calculations related to time value of money, compound interest, returns, break even points, and many more
